title: Pink Pleasure: Volume 1
description: A collection of the first three stories in the Tales of the Institute series. Follow the seductive Lady B as she bends the will and transforms the lives of all those who cross her path. In Pink Seduction, Lady B helps a colleague relax into servitude while her pet assumes the power in their relationship. In Pink Surrender, a would-be criminal is trapped as a permanent part of the Institute!
author: Lyka Bloom
